attributes.action: give a response to the recent independent UN report stating that Israel commited deliberate war crimes against civilians in Palestine including the killing of 252 children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the report by Richard Goldstone on behalf of the UN that stated "The mission concluded that actions amounting to war crimes, and possibly in some respect crimes against humanity, were committed by the Israel Defence Force,", what action will be taken by the British Government against Israel?.
